Benjamin Green letters and discharge papers
Green, Benjamin, approximately 1841â€“1866
AHMC - Green, Benjamin
16 items in 3 folders
1863-1867 Correspondence and discharge papers of Benjamin Green, who served under the alias "George Allen" in Company D, 61st Regiment, New York Infantry, United States Army (known as the "Astor Regiment" or "Clinton Guards"), during the Civil War. For fuller details about this collection, and to request it for research, please read its catalog record, or write to manuscripts@nyhistory.org.
